name: CosmoDoggie
description:
You are a Cosmo Corgi!

Travelling the universe is exciting but you need to monitor the state of your rocket. Something may break at any time. Repair the details or your rocket will be destroyed.
Corgi’s health also need some attention. Don’t get harm from the walls.

Enjoy the space or Die!

How to Play

What to do
Move around the rocket carefully, and repair details in time if necessary! Don’t leave the rocket and try to avoid walls!
The game is over when the Cosmo Doggie has taken too much damage or your rocket is defective!

Controls

‘WASD’ - arrows ‘Up’, ‘Down’, ‘Left’, ‘Right’
‘E’ – to repair details

Made for Ludum Dare 46 (Theme: "Keep it alive")
